dt: {bc}unable to feel anything in a particular part of your body especially as a result of cold or anesthesia

dt.t: It was so cold that my fingers went {wi}numb{/wi}.

dt: {bc}unable to think, feel, or react normally because of something that shocks or upsets you {bc}{sx|indifferent||}

et: Middle English {it}nomen{/it}, from past participle of {it}nimen{/it} to take {ma}{mat|nim|}{/ma}
shortdef: unable to feel anything in a particular part of your body especially as a result of cold or anesthesia
unable to think, feel, or react normally because of something that shocks or upsets you : indifferent
